# zero

**Type Property**

A size proposal that contains zero in both dimensions.

## Declaration

```swift
static let zero: ProposedViewSize
```

## Discussion

Subviews of a custom layout return their minimum size when you propose this value using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/LayoutSubview/dimensions(in:)] method. A custom layout should also return its minimum size from the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Layout/sizeThatFits(proposal:subviews:cache:)] method for this value.

## Getting standard proposals

- **infinity**: A size proposal that contains infinity in both dimensions.
- **unspecified**: The proposed size with both dimensions left unspecified.
